<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk remove due dates"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/remove-due-date"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes due dates from multiple tickets in a single bulk operation. Use this to clear deadline requirements when project timelines change or when tickets no longer have time-sensitive completion requirements.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets with due dates and collect `Items[].TicketId` values.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with due date filter (HasDueDate) → collect `TicketId` array
2. Review: Confirm these tickets should have due dates removed
3. Bulk remove: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/remove-due-date](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-remove-ticket-due-date) with ticket IDs
4. Verify: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to confirm due dates are cleared

**Request Body**: Provide `TicketIds` array.

**Note**: Removing due dates also cancels any scheduled reminder notifications for those tickets.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-due-date](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-set-ticket-due-date) – Bulk set due dates
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/due-dates](/docs/api/tickets/set-ticket-due-date) – Set single ticket due date

  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
